title: Biochemical production of short-chain alcohols from glycerol: process simulation and economic evaluation
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, 8,2019-2037
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE00229F, Paper
Lia G. M. Albuquerque, Raquel M. Cavalcante, André F. Young
Biochemical production processes were simulated in Aspen HYSYS® v12. Reaction times and glycerol dilution were identified as the main bottlenecks, but propanol production can be feasible if more productive and tolerant microorganisms can be designed.
